| HistoryText             = While dealing with the blackouts caused by [[Nyx (Earth-616)|Nyx]],{{r|Avengers No Road Home Vol 1 1}} this team was in communication with [[T'Challa (Earth-616)|Black Panther]], who lead the main [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]] team against a vampire threat. [[Adam Brashear (Earth-616)|Blue Marvel]] instructed [[America Chavez (Earth-616)|America]] and [[Miguel Santos (Earth-616)|Lightning]] to help him be everywhere at once in order to quell global panic, while [[Toni Ho (Earth-616)|Toni]] and [[Nadia Van Dyne (Earth-616)|Wasp]] were in charge of restoring power to the world. [[Alphonsus Lefszycic (Earth-616)|Gomi]], [[Bill the Lobster (Earth-616)|Bill]], and [[Aikku Jokinen (Earth-616)|Pod-2]] were in charge of preventing global tensions from erupting into a Third World War.{{r|Avengers No Road Home Vol 1 9}}
